name: bc-google-resume-workshop
title: Google at BC: Resume Event/Reviews
shortDescription: Learn tips on updating your resume to ensure that you're industry-ready for internships and full-time opportunities.
longDescription: Hear how to maximize each year of school to ensure that you're industry-ready for internships and full-time opportunities. Learn tips on updating your resume, preparing for technical interviews, and communicating effectively with recruiters. (This event is presented with Brooklyn College, and is not affiliated with the Computer Science Club.)
